medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric and RUQ pain accompanied by nausea and non-bilious non-bloody emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 days prior to admission, with significant pain relief after receiving pain medications. No fevers, chills, diarrhea, or changes in stool or urine color were reported. An urticarial rash developed in the past 24 hours.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Symptomatic cholelithiasis, cervical cancer in situ.
